attributes.additional_details: Children and Parents and Autism is amazing group for children and young adults in Downpatrick Northern Ireland.  Currently they are losing their premises in December.  There are perfect  premises on the Strangford road but due to the council merger down council are scared to make a decision.  Surely if we could lease these premises for 2 years this would be better than them staying empty and the council paying the rates on them (using your money) Please sign this e petition to help save CAPAA and ensure this valuable and enjoyable resource for people with autism carries on. Having worked here myself I know what a fantastic place this is for people with autism to socialise and be themselves.
